title: Enhanced Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Perform an in-depth analysis of user requirements for the FocusBoosterHeadband. This includes features, design, performance, compatibility, and user experience. Research on existing solutions, market trends, user interviews, competitor analysis, and a detailed study of neurofeedback algorithms will be conducted to ensure our product's uniqueness and innovative functionality. Collaboration with multidisciplinary experts such as neurologists, UX/UI designers, data scientists, and neuroscientists is strongly recommended for this task. Note that this task requires a comprehensive research approach.

title: Design the User Interface for the Headband
description: Create a user-friendly design for the FocusBoosterHeadband that clearly communicates its functions and integrates seamlessly with users' routines.

title: Design the Electronics for EEG Monitoring
description: Design the electronic components required to monitor attention levels using EEG, including sensors, amplifiers, and signal processing algorithms.

title: Develop the Mobile Application for FocusBoosterHeadband
description: Create a mobile app that connects to the FocusBoosterHeadband and provides users with real-time attention level feedback, alerts, and customization options.
dependencies: Design the User Interface for the Headband
Design the Electronics for EEG Monitoring

title: Create a Database Schema for Storing and Analyzing Data
description: Design a database schema that can store user data, attention level measurements, and other relevant information to support analysis and machine learning algorithms.

title: Implement the FocusBoosterHeadband's Electronics
description: Build and assemble the FocusBoosterHeadband according to the designed specifications, incorporating the EEG monitoring system.
dependencies: Design the Electronics for EEG Monitoring

title: Integration of Mobile Application and FocusBoosterHeadband
description: Establish a secure communication channel between the mobile app and the FocusBoosterHeadband, allowing for real-time data exchange.
dependencies: Develop the Mobile Application for FocusBoosterHeadband

title: Perform Functional and Security Testing
description: Test the functionality, usability, and security of the FocusBoosterHeadband and its mobile app.
dependencies: Develop the Mobile Application for FocusBoosterHeadband

title: Prepare User Manual and Documentation
description: Write user-friendly manuals and documentation for the FocusBoosterHeadband and its mobile app, including installation, usage, troubleshooting, and safety guidelines.
dependencies: Develop the Mobile Application for FocusBoosterHeadband
